scripts.disable-obfuscation: cp dictionary.js dictionary_disabled.js; rm dictionary.js; cp obfuscationMapping.js obfuscationMapping_disabled.js; rm obfuscationMapping.js;
scripts.enable-obfuscation: cp dictionary_disabled.js dictionary.js; rm dictionary_disabled.js; cp obfuscationMapping_disabled.js obfuscationMapping.js; rm obfuscationMapping_disabled.js;
scripts.manual-test: (yarn disable-obfuscation; yarn start; yarn enable-obfuscation;) || (npm run disable-obfuscation; npm run start; npm run enable-obfuscation;)
scripts.test: (yarn disable-obfuscation; mocha; yarn enable-obfuscation;) || (npm run disable-obfuscation; mocha; npm run enable-obfuscation;)
